SEARCH
Package UI

Class CampUI

java.lang.Object
UI.UI
UI.CampUI
public class CampUI extends UI
The `CampUI` class represents the user interface for managing and interacting with camps. It provides methods for creating, editing, viewing, and registering for camps. Users can perform actions such as creating new camps, registering for existing camps, editing their own camps, and more.

    editCampUI()
    Handles the user interface for editing camp information, allowing the user to select and modify various attributes of the camp.

    Prints information about camps created by the current user.

    printCampInformation()
    Prints detailed information about a camp, including its name, dates, location, and more.

    Handles the user interface for registering for a camp, including selecting the camp and registration type (attendee or committee member).

    Sets the current camp for the user interface.
    void
    showAvailableCampsForStudent(User user)
    Displays available camps for a student to register based on faculty and existing registrations.

    Displays a menu and collects user input to create a new camp.
    void
    showRegisteredCamps()
    Displays a list of camps that the current user is registered for.
    void
    staffUI()
    Displays camp information as seen by staff members, including all details.
    void
    withdrawCampUI()
    Handles the user interface for withdrawing from a camp, allowing the user to select and confirm withdrawal from a registered camp.

  • Method Details

    • setCamp

      public void setCamp(Camp c)
      Sets the current camp for the user interface.
      Parameters:
      c - The camp to set as the current camp.

    • showCreateCamp

      public int showCreateCamp()
      Displays a menu and collects user input to create a new camp.
      Returns:
      The result of the camp creation operation.

    • printAllCamps

      public void printAllCamps()
      Prints information about all available camps.

    • printCampCreatedByUser

      public void printCampCreatedByUser(User user)
      Prints information about camps created by the current user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose camps are to be printed.

    • printCampInformation

      public void printCampInformation()
      Prints detailed information about a camp, including its name, dates, location, and more.

    • registerCampUI

      public boolean registerCampUI()
      Handles the user interface for registering for a camp, including selecting the camp and registration type (attendee or committee member).
      Returns:
      True if registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • editCampUI

      public void editCampUI()
      Handles the user interface for editing camp information, allowing the user to select and modify various attributes of the camp.

    • showAvailableCampsForStudent

      public void showAvailableCampsForStudent(User user)
      Displays available camps for a student to register based on faculty and existing registrations.
      Parameters:
      user - The student user for whom available camps are displayed.

    • staffUI

      public void staffUI()
      Displays camp information as seen by staff members, including all details.

    • showRegisteredCamps

      public void showRegisteredCamps()
      Displays a list of camps that the current user is registered for.

    • withdrawCampUI

      public void withdrawCampUI()
      Handles the user interface for withdrawing from a camp, allowing the user to select and confirm withdrawal from a registered camp.
